meanings.sent1: The landowners in our town take care of their properties.
meanings.sent2: The landowners decided to build a new fence around their land.
meanings.sent3: The landowners organized a community garden on their properties.
meanings.sent4: The landowners were the kings and queens of their own little kingdoms.
meanings.sent5: The landowners proudly displayed their deeds to the land.

meanings.sent1: Many landowners in the area have been farming for generations.
meanings.sent2: The landowners gathered for a meeting to discuss property taxes.
meanings.sent3: The landowners hosted a picnic on their vast estates.
meanings.sent4: The landowners' wealth lay in the acres they owned.
meanings.sent5: The landowners' fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
